name.description: The name of the required package.
name.title: Name

specifier.description: Version specifier for the required package, may use PEP-508 or Poetry syntax.
specifier.title: Specifier

extras.description: Extras enabled for the required package.
extras.title: Extras

marker.description: Environment marker expression describing when this requirement should be installed.
marker.title: Marker

groups.description: Dependency groups that this requirement is part of.
groups.title: Groups
